description: Four unions are left "shocked and frustrated" by the Manx government's approach to a pay dispute.
title: Manx government position on teacher pay 'shameful'
title_page: Manx government position on teacher pay 'shameful' - BBC News
maintext: "The joint trade unions were shocked and frustrated that despite agreeing to the meeting, the government refused to enter into any negotiations other than to discuss cuts," the statement said, adding that they were "further appalled that there seemed to be no immediate appetite... to request any additional funding".
